description.en: Teach your robot how to play mini golf
Place six ping pong balls at the start line. Try to position them at the six color hole with the help of a 'golf club'

Do not help with hands
Each ball should launch from start line

1-2 balls are in different holes = Good job! Are you ready for another round?
5-6 balls are in six different holes = Outstanding! You are such a pro! Well done!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programing your robot?

Let's count your points.
3-5 empty holes = 5 points
2 empty holes = 10 points
<1 empty hole = 15 points
We would love to see your results, please share it thorough our forum page by clicking on the following link:
